page.title: 01A BASIC LOOK AROUND OUR AREA
page.content: Our area consists of three villages each different from the other.They are called{Oldcotes,Langold}and {Firbeck.}We have got one Hamlet in our area called{Letwell.}People have to travel to larger towns and cities to shop and for entertainment.Our area is surrounded by{Worksop, Sheffield, {Rotherham}and{Doncaster}and people travel to work in these places from the villages in our area.{Letwell}and{ {Firbeck}are in{South Yorkshire}and{ {Langold}and{Oldcotes}are in{ {Nottinghamshire.}Our area is in the middle of the{South Yorkshire}coal field but there are no mines in our area.The{St Ledger}was first run on land that the St. Ledger family owned in our area. Most of the area is farmland used for crops and not for grazing land and has some woods inbetween the fields.
